email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Cargo size is 75,000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT. Laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quote. USD 25.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 24.75 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 24.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 24.00? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 22-27 October?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 24.00 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 22-27 October. Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 75,000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 22-27 October
- Freight: USD 24.00 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah
